result.execSummary:
All charges against Tomas Santiago Hernandez in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Tomas Santiago Hernandez is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Tomas Santiago Hernandez

records.addlTxt: Alex Kitto no longer represents the defendant.

10:09 AM Defendant Tomas Santiago Hernandez not in court.  Attorney Alex Kitto in court for Tomas Santiago Hernandez.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Covers 22CF192, 22TR1245 and 22TR1246
Interpreter appeared by zoom and was released from hearing.  Attorney Kitto relates defendant has been deported.  State moves to dismiss each case.  Court dismisses each case and orders bond to be returned.

Count 1 Citation - Veh. Operator Fee/Elude Officer

records.addlTxt:
11:00 AM Defendant Tomas Santiago Hernandez appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Alex Kitto in court for Tomas Santiago Hernandez.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court reporter appeared by video.
11:04 Swits Interpreter sworn 11:05 Attorney Kitto, Defendant and Interpreter speak privately in the courtroom 11:10 Court calls case 11:11 Officer Jonathan Day called and sworn - Direct by State 11:29 Cross exam by Attorney Kitto 11:33 Court finds probable cause and binds over.   Case concludes at 11:35 AM.
Arraignment scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Office of State Public Defender Appointment of Counsel Report

1:00 PM Defendant Tomas Santiago Hernandez appeared by video, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court Reporter appeared by Zoom video means. 
Attorney Alex Kitto appeared by video for Tomas Santiago Hernandez for today only.  1:12 p.m. Interpreter Saul Ortega appears by Zoom video.  1:15 p.m. Interpreter sworn.  Qualifies for public defender.  Preliminary Hearing set. Call ends with Interpreter at 1:19 p.m.

CC:  MN & JA

SCANNED TO BARRON COUNTY JAIL
Preliminary Hearing - Schedule or Waiver scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473.
Se tomaran las huellas digitales del acusado en el Departamento del Sheriff del Condado de Barron, si aun no lo ha hecho.
Si esta representado por el Defensor Publico y no tiene telefono, debe comunicarse con el Defensor Publico semanalmente al 715-908-8473.

Must not possess or consume alcoholic beverages.
No debe poseer ni consumir bebidas alcoholicas.

May not go onto any premises where alcohol is sold.
No puede ingresar a ningun local donde se venda alcohol.

1:07 PM Defendant Tomas Santiago Hernandez appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Alex Kitto appeared by video for Tomas Santiago Hernandez.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.
1:07 Swits Interpreter sworn.  Defendant needs to contact Public Defender's office.  Defendant does not know his phone number.  State requests cash bond.  1:16 Attorney Kitto, Defendant and Interpreter put in a break out room 1:21 Attorney Kitto relates.  Bond set.  Case concludes at 1:27 PM.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 2, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
